definitions.definition: A plant of species Crocus sativus , a crocus .
A spice ( seasoning ) and colouring agent made from the stigma and part of the style of the plant, sometimes or formerly also used as a dye and insect repellent.
An orange - yellow colour , the colour of a lion's pelt.

main_definition: A plant of species Crocus sativus , a crocus .
secondary_definitions: A spice ( seasoning ) and colouring agent made from the stigma and part of the style of the plant, sometimes or formerly also used as a dye and insect repellent.
An orange - yellow colour , the colour of a lion's pelt.
